reviewText: Honestly, not as funny as my kids seemed to remember it, with the exception of the often-quoted (in our hose) skit, "The Procrastinator."  "Brad, are you going to write that review?" "I'll do it...eventually!"
The. Amanda Show is funny something to watch and something to laugh with way to go Amanda! Amanda you are Great!
This show was my childhood! So glad that Amazon had this! Great product at a great price! I bought The Best of Season One, Season Two, Season Three, and this one! So happy! Thank you, Amazon!

This is a great dvd for people of all ages. I've been watching The Amanda Show since it started in 1999. This is one of the best Nickelodeon shows out there!!! If you love The Amanda Show, then buy this dvd now!!!!!!!!!

Episodes Included:
1. The Best of Freaky Families
2. The Best of Penelope Taynt
3. Amanda's Favorites
4. The Best of Judge Trudy
5. The Best of Drake and Josh
6. The Best of Commercials
